features: ✅【2024 Newest Take Apart Dinosaur Toys】Our building toys include 3 kinds of dinosaur: blue Tyrannosaurus Rex, green Triceratops, brown Velociraptor. Kids can open this dinosaur Kit box and start playing immediately. The multi-color design helps attract children's attention to creative assembly and promotes children's teamwork.

✅【Educational STEM Learning Toy】Simulation design and clear textures of dinosaur toys, enable kids to recognize and explore the world of dinosaurs. Each part is assembled by the children themselves, which can develop their hand-eye coordination and stimulate the imagination of dinosaurs. Let your children fall in love with assembly and dinosaurs!!!

✅【High-Quality Dinosaur Toys】Made of high-quality, non-toxic and recyclable ABS plastic. The edges and corners have been specially treated, so you don't need to worry that the parts will scratch their hands during the assembly. Laradola kids toys for kids are sturdy and durable, even if dropped from a high place, they will not break easily. It is the best choice for toddler toys age 3-8.

✅【Easy to Assemble Kids Toys】Our take apart toys package also contains 1 electric drill with 2 different drill bits, 3 pcs hand screwdrivers, and assemble instructions. Each step is explained clearly in the instructions in detail, and it is easy for kids to understand. The electric drill is low-speed, which can be rotated to tighten & loosen screws and encounter obstacle will automatically stop. Won't hurt the kids.

🎁【Amazing Toys and Birthday Gifts for Kids】These dinosaur toys for boys & girls are the highly recommended gift for Easter, birthday, Christmas or party, especially for 3-8 years old kids. We are so confident that your kids would like our Laradola Christmas gifts for boys. BUY IT NOW and let the kid put down their mobile phones and ipads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tot for my boys
reviews.reviewText: My two boys love building these Dino’s with the little power tool! They also love taking them apart too. Bolts and screws are good size and easy to use with their little hands. Power tool is easy to use. One button to screw in and another to take the screw out. Easy to learn for my 2 and 3 year old boys. Construction of the Dino’s is good. Not cheap plastic and they don’t fall apart once you build them. Price was great on this product and helps keep the boys busy and working on the dexterity/hand-eye coordination!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my son for his 4th birthday because he loves dinosaurs. He had the best time ever building them and was so proud of himself! Easy to put together, quality material and parts! Definitely worth every penny, would highly recommend! I’m even going to shop for other animals to put together right now for my son!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome toy, even better customer service.
reviews.reviewText: Ordered these for my son's Christmas. They're really awesome. You can build them like the picture or mix and match them between each other. My son loves the little drill that came with it.Only issue we had was that it looks like during manufacturing one foot of one of the dinosaurs was missing a part. We emailed the customer service for the company that makes them and they sent us a new dinosaur the next day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Needed a lot of help
reviews.reviewText: The screws were a little smaller than I thought they would be. Grandparent's have a similar toy but the screws were much easier for my 3 year old to handle. This set requires much more parental help.These dinosaurs were a hit for my robot dinosaur loving boy. Once they were put together he really hasn't wanted to take them apart because he loves them so much and it was "work" to put them together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun for adults too
reviews.reviewText: Got these dinosaurs for my nephew a year ago but we didn't put them together until yesterday (he's 5 now). He loves doing projects together. I knew as we were building them I was going to be leaving a 5 star review. They're very well made with easy to understand instructions but can be put together without the instructions. They are actually adorable, not scary-looking like some toy dinosaurs can be. I like that they give you extra screws, a drill, and 3 screw drivers. This set would be great for siblings or for dinosaur themed parties. Each child gets what they need to build their own dinosaur, the activity of building them is great fun, and then they have a handmade party favor to take home with them. I suggest sorting/seperating everything by color and screw count before giving them to the kids. My nephew loved being the designated drill guy but used the screwdrivers as well. He needed help, as he's 5 but, he felt a part of it. He felt proud of himself when we had 3 dinosaurs that he made. We built all 3 one after the other and he didn't lose patience or get bored. Best part is he can take them apart and build them all over again, and without instructions for a challenge.These are great for kids who love to build/assemble and for kids who love dinosaurs. Great for adults too- I had fun!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good set for a toddler
reviews.reviewText: My 4 year grandson loved the dinosaur set. It came with parts to assemble 3 colorful good size dinosaurs. The best part he liked was the motorized screw driver he could use to put it together. I would highly recommend it for a toddler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My son is 4 years old and enjoyed putting these together! The drill and pieces were easy to use! I really loved these for him!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids loved it
reviews.reviewText: So I wasn’t sure what to expect but since daddy does construction I thought it might be something cute for ALL the guys to do and I’m so happy, ALL the boys LOVED them (dad included) The instructions were a little confusing at 1st but really They weren’t too difficult. Very happy with this purchase and will definitely be looking for more “take apart” toys
